ComicInfo.Title: The Fall of G.I. Joe Part Seven
ComicInfo.Summary:
THE FALL OF G.I. JOE! Entrenched in a war-torn Eastern European nation, the G.I. JOE team collides with separatists, ex-teammates, locals, and COBRA. Politics collides with boots on the ground in one of the most unforgettable G.I. JOE epics of all time!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Jeffrey Veregge | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Sanjay Kharwar (a) & Dheeraj Verma (c) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 05:52:18. [CVDB484921]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dheeraj Verma, Jeffrey Veregge, Sanjay Kharwar
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Helix, Baroness, Big Ben, Duke, Flint, General Colton, Isaac Craft, Joshua Spinetti, Mainframe, Rashidov, Roadblock, Scarlett, Siren, Stasik, Tomax
